title: Fred Meyer shooting suspect had been shoplifting, ‘spiraling’ down, court documents say - OregonLive
content:
1. Fred Meyer shooting suspect had been shoplifting, ‘spiraling’ down, court documents say  OregonLive
  2. Richland Washington shooting - live: ‘Paranoid’ suspect Aaron Kelly shoplifted at Fred Meyer, employees say  The Independent
  3. Suspected gunman entered Washington grocery store with duffel bag and backpack, police say  NBC News
  4. Richland Police Department give more details of suspected shooter Aaron Kelly as he made his first court appearance  NBC Right Now
  5. Fred Meyers Gunman Aaron Christopher Kelly Was 'Spiraling Mentally,' Ex-Roommate Says  The Daily Beast
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The man is accused of walking into the Richland Fred Meyer about 11 a.m. Monday and shooting a customer multiple times in a grocery aisle. He then shot an employee had “some sort of conversation” with a shopper and wandered briefly in the store before leaving about 11:07 a.m., court documents said. The customer died and the employee remains hospitalized.
